definition[0]: a short period of time during which you are interested in something
example[0]: He started his own business last year, after a brief flirtation with political life.
definition[1]: behaviour that shows you are attracted to someone sexually
example[1]: She had no objection to a little mild flirtation.
definition[2]: a short sexual relationship which is not serious
example[2]: She had a brief flirtation with Tim.
